Combine sugar and water in a heavy saucepan. Cook over medium heat, stirring until mixture is a deep amber color, about 15 minutes. Brush down sides of pan with a wet brush, and swirl occasionally. Remove from heat. Gradually stir in 1 1/4 cups heavy cream. Add 1/4 cup butter, and stir until melted. Pour filling into crust.
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) until filling bubbles and thickens, about 30 minutes. Filling will be wobbly. Cool. Chill until set, about 1 hour.

In a heavy small saucepan, combine 3/4 cup heavy cream, chocolate, 3 tablespoons butter, and corn syrup. Cook over low heat, stirring until smooth.  Pour over chilled filling. Chill tart until firm, about 1 hour. Let stand 30 minutes at room temperature before serving.

title: Tip Top Toffee Ice Cream Pie
ingredients: 21 Cookies, chocolate sandwich, with creme filling, regular
1 cup Wheat flour, white, all-purpose, enriched, bleached
½ teaspoon Pure/Natural Almond Extract Flavor CCH
3 (1 ounce) squares Bakers Choc Semi-Sweet Chocolate Bar KFT
1 quart Frozen desserts, ice cream, chocolate
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Scatter the almonds in a jelly roll pan, and toast until golden, about 10 minutes. Set almonds aside, but leave the oven on.

In a food processor, grind the cookies until they are coarse crumbs. Transfer crumbs to a bowl, and stir in the flour. Stir in the 1/2 cup melted butter, and toss to moisten. Butter the bottom of a 10-inch springform pan, leaving the sides unbuttered. Press the mixture onto the bottom of the pan.
Bake until set, about 12 to 15 minutes. Transfer to a rack to cool. When crust has cooled, place it in the freezer for at least 30 minutes.
Butter a 9x13-inch pan; you'll need this for the toffee filling. Set aside 3 cups of the toasted sliced almonds.

In a large saucepan, combine the 1 1/3 cups butter, sugar, water, lemon juice, and salt. Bring to a boil, stirring to dissolve the sugar. Cook uncovered, without stirring, over medium heat until it caramelizes, about 8 minutes.  Remove the caramel from the heat, and stir in the vanilla, almond extract, and 3 cups of the almonds. Pour the mixture into the buttered pan, and set aside to cool.

In a microwave-safe bowl, microwave chocolate until melted. Stir occasionally until chocolate is smooth. Spread melted chocolate over the cooled toffee. Immediately sprinkle with about 1 cup of the remaining sliced almonds. Freeze for 1 hour, or until firm. Turn the toffee out onto a work surface, and break it into 1/2 inch pieces.

Let the ice cream soften very slightly in a large bowl. Stir briefly, just until malleable. Fold in the toffee pieces. With a large rubber spatula, spread the ice cream into the crust. Top with the remaining almonds. Place the pie in the freezer. When it has firmed up slightly, cover the top with plastic. Freeze until firm, about 6 hours.

Place the pie in the refrigerator to soften about 20 minutes before serving. Run the tip of a knife around the sides of the pie to loosen. Carefully remove the sides of the springform pan. Cut into wedges with a knife dipped in hot water.

title: Apple Raisin Cobbler Pie
ingredients: ⅓ cup Wheat flour, white, all-purpose, enriched, bleached
1 (9 inch) Pie crust, cookie-type, prepared from recipe, graham cracker, baked
instructions: Combine apple pie filling, raisins, and nutmeg in a bowl.  Pour into crust.
In another bowl, combine flour and brown sugar; cut in melted butter until mixture becomes   crumbly. Stir in nuts. Sprinkle mixture over the top of the pie filling.
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 35 to 45 minutes, or until top has browned.

title: Pumpkin Honey Pie
ingredients: ¾ cup Honey, strained or extracted
½ cup Milk, reduced fat, fluid, 2% milkfat, with added vitamin A
¼ cup Cream, fluid, heavy whipping
1 recipe Pie crust, standard-type, prepared from recipe, unbaked
instructions: Beat eggs slightly in a large bowl.  Blend in pumpkin, milk, cream, honey, spices, salt.  Pour filling into pie shell.  Cover edges of shell with strips of foil.
Bake at 400 degrees F (205 degrees C) for 35 minutes.  Remove foil, and continue baking for 15 more minutes.  An inserted knife should come out clean when done.  Cool, and serve.

title: Ham and Cheese Quiche
ingredients: 2 tablespoons Wheat flour, white, all-purpose, enriched, bleached
1 cup Cream, fluid, half and half
1 recipe Pie crust, standard-type, prepared from recipe, unbaked
½ cup Mushrooms, canned, drained solids
instructions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Beat together flour, salt, half-and-half and eggs in a medium bowl.

Place Swiss cheese flat in the pie crust. Arrange spinach evenly over Swiss cheese, then cover with mushrooms. Pour the flour and egg mixture over mushrooms. Cover with flaked ham and top with Cheddar cheese.
Bake in the preheated oven 45 to 55 minutes, until surface is golden brown.

title: Frosty Strawberry Pie
ingredients: 1 (3 ounce) package Jello Gelatin Mix-Strawberry-Dry KFT
2 cups Frozen desserts, ice cream, vanilla
1 (9 inch) Pie crust, cookie-type, prepared from recipe, graham cracker, baked
instructions: Dissolve gelatin in boiling water and gradually add ice cream, stirring until melted.  Note: if pie is to be chilled 3-4 hours before serving, increase to 1 1/2 cups water.
Chill til thick but NOT set (15-25 minutes) and then fold in strawberries and pour into pie crust.
Chill until firm; garnish with whipped cream and walnut halves.

title: Pecan Pumpkin Pie I
ingredients: 1 tablespoon Wheat flour, white, all-purpose, enriched, bleached
1 (14 ounce) can Milk, canned, condensed, sweetened
instructions: Combine eggs, sugars, flour, spices and salt.  Blend in pumpkin.  Gradually add milk; mix well.
Pour into 9-inch pie shell.  Bake in 450 degree F (230 degrees C) oven 10 minutes. Reduce heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and bake 40 to 50 minutes longer.
Sprinkle pecan mixture over pie the last 10 minutes before removing from the oven.
To Make Topping:  Combine 2 tablespoons butter, 1 tablespoon grated orange rind,   1/4 cup brown sugar and  3/4 cup whole pecans.

title: Key Lime Pie I
ingredients: 1 cup Cookies, graham crackers, plain or honey
1 (14 ounce) can Milk, canned, condensed, sweetened
1 pinch Leavening agents, cream of tartar
instructions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).  Mix graham cracker crumbs with sugar and melted butter. Press into 9 inch pie plate and bake for 5 minutes. Remove from oven and let cool.
Separate 2 of the eggs, placing the two egg whites into a mixing bowl. Reserve the yolks in another bowl.

To the yolks, add one whole egg, lime juice and sweetened condensed milk.  Whisk until smooth. With clean mixer blades or a whisk attachment, beat the egg whites with salt and cream of tartar until stiff, but not dry.  Fold whites into filling mixture.  Pour filling into partially baked crust.

Bake in preheated 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) for 10 to 15 minutes or until set.  Let cool at room temperature, then freeze 4 hours to overnight. Just before serving, whip cream to form stiff peaks.  Serve decorated with whipped cream and lime slices.

title: Strawberry Yogurt Pie I
ingredients: 2 (8 ounce) containers Dannon Nonfat Strawberry Yogurt-Light DA
1 (12 ounce) container Dessert topping, semi solid, frozen
1 (9 inch) Pie crust, cookie-type, prepared from recipe, graham cracker, baked
instructions: Mix yogurt with 3 and 1/2 cups of the dessert topping until blended.  Sweeten the strawberries, if necessary. Mix in strawberries and spoon into crust.
Freeze for at least 3 hours or overnight, if possible, until it's firm.
Remove from freezer and top with remainder of dessert topping.  Store in freezer.

title: Caramel Apple Pie I
ingredients: 1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch deep dish pie
1 (16 ounce) package Dessert topping, semi solid, frozen
instructions: Preheat oven and cookie sheet to 400 degrees F (205 degrees C).
Stir together the sugar, cornstarch and cinnamon.  Toss with the apples in a mixing bowl.

Pour the mixture into the first unbaked pie shell then drizzle the caramel topping over the top.  Sprinkle with pecans.  Place the second pie shell over this and flute the edges.  Cut slits in the top crust to allow steam to escape then place on preheated cookie sheet.
Bake 45-50 minutes, until golden brown.  Cool for 1 hour before slicing.  Top with whipped topping, if desired.

title: Key Lime Pie II
ingredients: 1 (3 ounce) package Jello Gelatin Mix-Lime-Dry KFT
1 (14 ounce) can Milk, canned, condensed, sweetened
1 (9 inch) Pie crust, standard-type, prepared from recipe, baked
instructions: Dissolve gelatin in boiling water.  Chill until mixture starts to congeal.
In a separate bowl (after gelatin has started to thicken and congeal) mix milk, lime juice, food coloring and grated lime rind until well blended.
Stir in sour cream; then fold in thickened gelatin.  Pour into pastry shell.  Chill until firm.
Garnish with whipped topping or whipped cream and lime slices.

title: Vinegar Pie I
ingredients: 1 (9 inch) Pie crust, standard-type, frozen, ready-to-bake, baked
¼ cup Wheat flour, white, all-purpose, enriched, bleached
instructions: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
Mix the flour with 1/2 cup of sugar. Add the water gradually and cook on top of a double boiler for 15 minutes, stirring constantly, or until thickened.

Combine the remaining 1/2 cup of sugar with the yolks and salt and mix well with a whisk until the sugar is dissolved. Add the hot flour mixture to the yolk mixture gradually, mixing all the time. Return to the double boiler  and cook for about 3 minutes more or until the mixture is thick and smooth.
Add the butter, extract, and vinegar. Mix well and remove from heat. Place a piece of plastic on top of this custard.
Meanwhile, beat the egg whites until foamy and gradually add the 6 tablespoons sugar. Beat until a stiff, glossy peak is achieved.

Pour the custard filling into the prebaked shell ( the custard should still be hot, if not, heat up a again before adding to shell). Top with the meringue. Spread the meringue all over the top of the pie, sealing to the edges of the crust. Place into the oven and bake until the meringue is a nice nut brown, about 15 minutes. Traditionally, this pie is served hot.

title: Vinegar Pie II
ingredients: 4 tablespoons Wheat flour, white, all-purpose, enriched, bleached
1 (9 inch) Pie crust, standard-type, frozen, ready-to-bake, baked
instructions: In the top of a double boiler, beat the egg yolks well.  Combine the flour, sugar, 1/8 teaspoon salt, allspice, and mace and blend into the egg yolks.  Add the 1/4 cup cider vinegar and mix, then add the warm water.  Simmer over boiling water for 25 minutes, or until the mixture is thickened; the water should just reach the bottom of the top pan.
Stir in the butter and cool slightly, about 15-20 minutes, without stirring.  Pour the warm filling into the baked shell; set aside to cool.

Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).  In a large mixer bowl, beat together the egg whites, 1/4 teaspoon salt and 1 teaspoon cider vinegar until soft peaks form.  Gradually add the 6 tablespoons of sugar, 1 tablespoon at a time.  Continue beating until stiff peaks form; sprinkle in the cornstarch just before the beating is completed.  The peaks should not topple over when the beater is raised.
Spread the meringue over the filling all the way to the edge of the pastry.  Bake for 15-18 minutes, or until the meringue is golden brown.  Cool the pie completely and then refrigerate.

title: Vinegar Pie III
ingredients: 4 tablespoons Wheat flour, white, all-purpose, enriched, bleached
1 (9 inch) Pie crust, standard-type, frozen, ready-to-bake, baked
instructions: Mix sugar and flour, add vinegar and beaten egg yolks.  Mix well.
Add 1 cup hot water.  Heat remaining 1 1/2 cups water to boiling and stir in egg yolk mixture.   Boil mixture until thick.  Remove from heat.
Add lemon extract and butter.  Cool.  Pour into a baked pie shell.

Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).  Beat egg whites until stiff; add 6 Tablespoons sugar and 1/4 teaspoon cream of tartar and continue beating until it holds a peak.  Pile meringue onto filling.  Bake until meringue is lightly browned, 10 - 15 minutes.

title: Pumpkin Pecan Pie I
ingredients: 1 recipe Pie crust, standard-type, prepared from recipe, unbaked
instructions: Stir together one egg, pumpkin, 1/3 cup sugar and spice. Spread over bottom of pie shell.
Combine 2 eggs, corn syrup, 1/2 cup sugar, butter and vanilla. Stir in nuts. Spoon over pumpkin mixture.
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 50 minutes until filling is set.

title: Pumpkin Pecan Pie II
ingredients: 1 recipe Pie crust, standard-type, prepared from recipe, unbaked
¾ cup Cream, fluid, heavy whipping
instructions: Mix together 3/4 to 1 cup brown sugar, 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon, and 1/4 teaspoon salt.  Stir in 1 canned pumpkin, eggs, corn syrup, and 1 teaspoon vanilla.
Pour mixture into pie shell and sprinkle with pecans.   Arrange additional pecans, if desired, for a "pretty" pie.
Bake 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 40 minutes. Cool. Serve with spicy whipped cream.

To Make Spicy Whipped Cream: In medium bowl, mix 1/2 cup brown sugar, 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon, 1/8 teaspoon nutmeg. Stir in 3/4 cup whipping cream and 1/2 teaspoon vanilla.  Chill 1 hour.  Whip until stiff.

title: Butter Bean Custard Pie
ingredients: 1 cup Grn Giant Butter Beans In Brine-Cnd PLB
1 tablespoon Wheat flour, white, all-purpose, enriched, bleached
¼ teaspoon Cream, fluid, half and half
1 recipe Pie crust, standard-type, prepared from recipe, unbaked
instructions: Soak the beans in the water overnight. The next morning, take the hull off beans. Place beans in a saucepan and add water to cover. Do not add seasoning. Bring to a boil, reduce heat, cover, and cook until beans are very tender, about 1 hour. Drain; when they have cooled slightly, mash beans.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Combine sugar, flour, butter, vanilla, eggs, and salt. Mix well. Stir in mashed beans; add cloves, nutmeg, cinnamon, and cream.
Pour into a pie shell. Bake until a knife inserted near the center of the pie comes out clean, 30 to 45 minutes. Allow to cool completely before serving. Store pie in refrigerator.

title: Key Lime Pie III
ingredients: 1 (9 inch) Pie crust, standard-type, frozen, ready-to-bake, baked
1 (3 ounce) package Jello Gelatin Mix-Lime-Dry KFT
1 (14 ounce) can Milk, canned, condensed, sweetened
1 teaspoon Angostura Aromatic Bitters-No Salt AN
instructions: Dissolve lime gelatin in boiling water, add lime rind and juice.  Slowly pour into egg yolk, stirring constantly.  Add condensed milk and bitters. Chill until slightly thick.
Beat egg white until stiff peaks form. Fold into lime gelatin mixture.  Add food coloring if desired.
Pour into baked pie shell.  Chill until firm or overnight.

title: Raspberry Pie I
ingredients: 1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch double crust pie
instructions: Mix together raspberries, sugar, cornstarch, minute tapioca and water. Mix and let sit while you make your pie crust. (See double crust recipes on this site if you do not have a recipe).
Put berries in bottom crust, and put 4 - 1 tablespoon pats of butter on top. Put on top crust and crimp edges. Make slits in the crust to allow the steam to escape.
Bake at 425 degrees F (220 degrees C) for 15 minutes. Reduce heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and bake for 45 minutes.

title: Pumpkin Chiffon Pie I
ingredients: 1 ¼ cups Pumpkin, canned, with salt
½ cup Milk, reduced fat, fluid, 2% milkfat, with added vitamin A
1 (.25 ounce) package Desserts, gelatins, dry powder, unsweetened
1 (9 inch) Pie crust, standard-type, frozen, ready-to-bake, baked
instructions: Beat egg yolks. Add 1/2 cup sugar, then pumpkin, milk, salt and spices. Cook in double boiler until thick.
Soften gelatin in cold water, then stir into hot mixture.
Beat whites to soft peaks, and gradually pour in 1/2 cup sugar. Continue whipping to medium-stiff peaks. Fold into the pumpkin mixture. Pour into cooled pie shell and chill. ENJOY!

title: Rhubarb Cobbler
ingredients: 1 cup Wheat flour, white, all-purpose, enriched, bleached
1 ½ teaspoons Leavening agents, baking powder, double-acting, sodium aluminum sulfate
¼ cup Milk, reduced fat, fluid, 2% milkfat, with added vitamin A
instructions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Lightly grease a 9 inch square baking dish.

In a saucepan, mix 3/4 cup sugar and cornstarch. Stir in the rhubarb and water. Bring to a boil. Cook and stir for 1 minute. Transfer to the prepared baking dish. Dot with butter, and sprinkle with cinnamon.
In a medium bowl, sift together flour, 1 tablespoon sugar, baking powder, and salt. Cut in the butter until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
In a small bowl, mix the milk and egg. Add all at once to dry ingredients, stirring just to moisten. Drop by teaspoonfuls on top of the rhubarb mixture. Sprinkle with sugar.
Bake for 20 minutes in the preheated oven, until crisp and lightly browned.

title: Chocolate Chip Pie IV
ingredients: 1 recipe Pie crust, standard-type, prepared from recipe, unbaked
½ cup Wheat flour, white, all-purpose, enriched, bleached
instructions: In a mixing bowl, mix sugar and flour.
Stir in beaten eggs, butter, nuts, chocolate chips and vanilla.  Mix well.
Pour mixture into pie crust.  Place pie pan on cookie sheet.  Bake in a preheated 325 degree F (165 degree C) oven for one hour.

title: Big Guy Strawberry Pie
ingredients: 1 cup Wheat flour, white, all-purpose, enriched, bleached
instructions: In a saucepan, combine water, white sugar, salt, cornstarch and food coloring (optional). Bring to a boil, and cook for about 5 minutes or until thickened. Set aside to cool. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C.)

In a large bowl, combine flour, confectioners' sugar, and vanilla. Cut in butter until the mixture resembles small crumbs. Press into a 9-inch pie pan. Prick all over with a fork and bake in the preheated oven for 8 to 10 minutes, or until lightly browned.
When crust is cool, place berries in the shell, and pour the thickened mixture over the top. Chill in refrigerator.

title: Lemon Pie I
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) can Milk, canned, condensed, sweetened
1 (8 ounce) container Dessert topping, semi solid, frozen
1 (9 inch) Pie crust, cookie-type, prepared from recipe, graham cracker, baked
instructions: In a bowl, combine milk and lemon juice; mix until smooth (mixture will begin to thicken). Fold in whipped topping; spoon into crust. Chill until ready to serve, at least 4 hours or overnight.

title: Lemon Pie II
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) can Milk, canned, condensed, sweetened
1 (9 inch) Pie crust, cookie-type, prepared from recipe, graham cracker, baked
½ cup Cream, fluid, heavy whipping
instructions: Mix together the cream cheese, milk and lemon juice. Mix well and spread in graham crust. Chill until set, at least 2 hours, and top as desired.

title: Peanut Butter Pie V
ingredients: 2 (9 inch) Pie crust, cookie-type, prepared from recipe, graham cracker, baked
1 cup Peanut butter, chunk style, with salt
2 (8 ounce) containers Dessert topping, semi solid, frozen
instructions: Mix together the cream cheese and confectioners' sugar.  Cream well together.
Add vanilla and peanut butter and mix well.
Fold in 1 - 8 ounce container whipped dessert topping.   Spoon into the pie shells.  Then top each pie the remaining dessert topping.  Chill before serving.

title: Naughty Hula Pie
ingredients: 1 (9 inch) Pie crust, cookie-type, prepared from recipe, chocolate wafer, chilled
1 quart Frozen desserts, ice cream, vanilla
1 (6.5 ounce) jar Nuts, macadamia nuts, raw
1 (12 ounce) jar Kraft Hot Fudge Topping KFT
½ cup Cream, fluid, heavy whipping
instructions: Reserve 1/2 cup of the nuts and stir the remaining nuts into the ice cream.  Fill the cookie shell and return to the freezer until firm.
When ready to serve cover the top with fudge sauce, dollop with whipped cream and sprinkle with reserved 1/2 cup chopped macadamia nuts.

title: Clarke Cheesecake Pie
ingredients: 1 (9 inch) Pie crust, cookie-type, prepared from recipe, graham cracker, baked
1 (14 ounce) can Milk, canned, condensed, sweetened
instructions: Blend together cream cheese and milk.  Stir in vanilla.  Add lemon juice 1 teaspoon at a time, blending well after each addition.
Pour filling into a 9 inch graham cracker crust.  Refrigerate for 4 hours, or overnight to set.

title: Baked Fresh Cherry Pie
ingredients: 1 recipe Pie crust, standard-type, prepared from recipe, unbaked
¼ teaspoon Pure/Natural Almond Extract Flavor CCH
instructions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (205 degrees C). Place bottom crust in pie pan.  Set top crust aside, covered.

In a large mixing bowl combine tapioca, salt, sugar, cherries, and extracts. Let stand 15 minutes. Turn out into bottom crust and dot with butter. Cover with top crust, flute edges and cut vents in top. Place pie on a foil-lined cookie sheet--in case of drips!
Bake for 50 minutes in the preheated oven, until golden brown. Let cool for several hours before slicing.

title: Cornish Pasty
ingredients: 2.188 cups Wheat flour, white, all-purpose, enriched, bleached
1 teaspoon Leavening agents, baking powder, double-acting, sodium aluminum sulfate
1 ¼ pounds Beef, round, bottom round, separable lean and fat, trimmed to 1/4" fat, select, raw
2 medium (2-1/4" to 3" dia, raw)s Potatoes, raw
2 tablespoons Milk, reduced fat, fluid, 2% milkfat, with added vitamin A
instructions: In a small saucepan, cover carrots with water. Bring water to a boil and cook until tender, about 10 minutes. Let cool and slice. Sift flour, salt, and baking powder together in a bowl.  Add butter, and rub to the consistency of coarse crumbs.  Mix in water.  If dough is sticky, add more flour.
Roll dough out until about 1/4 inch thick.  Cut out six circles, each about 5 inches round.  Do not stretch the dough.

Mix meat and vegetables together, and salt and pepper to taste.  Cover half of each  pasty base with the filling.  Moisten pastry edges, fold pastry over the filling.  Press edges together with a fork.  Transfer raw pasties to a baking sheet, brush tops with milk, and make a small slit in each top to allow steam out.
Bake at 450 degrees F ( 230 degrees C) for 10 minutes.  Turn oven down to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C), and bake for 35 minutes.

title: October Apple Pie
ingredients: 1 recipe Pie crust, standard-type, prepared from recipe, unbaked
3 tablespoons Wheat flour, white, all-purpose, enriched, bleached
instructions: In a large bowl, combine apples, lemon juice, sugars, spices, flour, butter, and caramels.  Stir to coat fruit evenly.

Roll dough out, and cut out two crusts.  Line a pie plate with one of the crusts.  Spoon filling into the bottom crust, and cover with the top crust.  Crimp the edges. Place the pie on a baking sheet covered with foil.  Poke fork holes over top.  Sprinkle lightly with granulated sugar.
Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 50 minutes.  If you notice overbrowning after 30 minutes, reduce heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).  Serve warm, or at room temperature.

title: Pineapple Coconut Pie
ingredients: 1 (9 inch) Pie crust, standard-type, prepared from recipe, baked
2 ½ cups Pineapple juice, canned, unsweetened, without added ascorbic acid
⅓ cup Wheat flour, white, all-purpose, enriched, bleached
1 cup Nuts, coconut meat, dried (desiccated), sweetened, flaked, packaged
instructions: Combine pineapple juice, flour, sugar, salt, and egg in a blender.  Blend until smooth.
In a medium saucepan, cook and stir over medium heat until thick.  Remove from heat. Stir in coconut, butter and vanilla.  Mix well.  Pour into baked pie shell.  Cool until set.

title: New Zealand Pavlova
instructions: Preheat oven to 475 degrees F (245 degrees C).  Cover a baking sheet with foil, and spray lightly with cooking spray.

In a large bowl, beat the egg whites to form stiff peaks.  Add white sugar slowly, and continue beating.  When egg whites are very stiff, add vinegar and boiling water.  Continue beating until glossy surface is beginning to fade, and mixture is very stiff.   Pile meringue onto prepared baking sheet.  Shape into a circle 1 1/2 inches thick.   Form a slight dip in the center, and make the sides slightly higher.

Place meringue in the oven, shut the door, and turn the heat off.  Leave in the oven for one hour. Check the texture of the meringue; it should be hard with no soft spots.  If soft in the center, heat oven to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C).  Place meringue back into the oven, and turn off the heat.  Cool when done.  Transfer onto a serving platter.
Whip the cream until just stiff. Beat in vanilla and confectioners' sugar.  Pile the whipped cream onto the meringue. Arrange the fruit on top of the whipped cream, and serve.

title: Custard Pie I
ingredients: ½ (9 inch) Pie crust, standard-type, prepared from recipe, unbaked
2 cups Milk, reduced fat, fluid, 2% milkfat, with added vitamin A
instructions: Beat eggs with a whisk.  Beat in sugar, milk, and salt.  Pour filling into pie crust.  Sprinkle nutmeg and cinnamon on top.
Bake at 425 degrees F (220 degrees C) for 15 minutes.  Reduce heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C), and continue baking for an additional 45 minutes.

title: Cherry Pie I
ingredients: 1 (9 inch) Pie crust, cookie-type, prepared from recipe, vanilla wafer, chilled
1 (.25 ounce) package Desserts, gelatins, dry powder, unsweetened
instructions: In a small bowl, soften gelatin in cold water.  Set aside.

In a medium saucepan, mash half the cherries with the sugar.  Stir in cornstarch, lemon juice, and food coloring. Cook over medium heat, stirring until thick and transparent.  Remove from heat. Add gelatin, and stir briskly.
Slice remaining cherries into the crust, and pour gelatin mixture over cherries. Chill at least 4 hours before serving.

title: Chocolate Mocha Pie
ingredients: 1 (9 inch) Pie crust, cookie-type, prepared from recipe, chocolate wafer, chilled
1 (3.5 ounce) package Desserts, puddings, chocolate, dry mix, regular
2 ½ cups Milk, reduced fat, fluid, 2% milkfat, with added vitamin A
1 (1.3 ounce) envelope Dream Whip Whipped Topping Mix-Dry KFT
instructions: Prepare pie filling using the directions on the package, using 2 cups milk.
In a small bowl, combine 1 cup hot filling, instant coffee, and sugar.   Stir to dissolve and blend.  Chill.
Cool remaining filling 5 minutes, stirring several times.  Pour into crust, and chill.

Prepare whipped topping mix as directed on package, using remaining 1/2 cup milk and vanilla.  Beat chilled cup of pudding until smooth, and then fold into whipped topping.  Pile lightly over filling in crust, spreading evenly.  Chill several hours before serving.  Top with chocolate sprinkles if desired.

title: Flapper Pie I
ingredients: 1 ½ cups Cookies, graham crackers, plain or honey
1 tablespoon Wheat flour, white, all-purpose, enriched, bleached
2 cups Milk, reduced fat, fluid, 2% milkfat, with added vitamin A
½ teaspoon Pure/Natural Almond Extract Flavor CCH
instructions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

Mix together graham cracker crumbs, 1/4 cup sugar, and 1/3 cup softened butter.  Reserve 1/4 cup of the crumb mixture for topping the pie. Press remaining crumbs into a 9-inch pie plate. Bake in preheated oven for 8 minutes.

Mix 1/2 cup sugar, cornstarch, flour, and salt in a saucepan. Stir in milk gradually. Cook over medium heat, stirring, until mixture comes to a boil and thickens. Cook 2 minutes more.  Add a little of this hot mixture to beaten egg yolks, then stir yolks into hot mixture.  Cook 1 minute while stirring.

Remove pan from heat. In a steady stream, pour hot milk mixture into beaten egg yolks, whisking constantly. Return custard to saucepan. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until mixture thickens slightly and coats the back of a wooden spoon, about 2 minutes more. Remove from heat; stir in 1 tablespoon butter and vanilla.  Cool 15 minutes, and pour into crumb crust. Cool completely.
Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).

Beat egg whites until soft peaks form. Slowly add 1/4 cup sugar, beating until stiff and glossy. Stir in almond extract. Spread meringue over filling, and against the edge of crust to seal. Sprinkle with reserved crumbs.
Bake in preheated oven just until meringue is golden, about 4 to 5 minutes. Allow pie to cool completely before serving.

title: Graham Cracker Crust I
ingredients: 1 ½ cups Cookies, graham crackers, plain or honey
instructions: Mix graham cracker crumbs, sugar, melted butter or margarine, and cinnamon until well blended . Press mixture into an 8 or 9 inch pie plate.
Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 7 minutes.  Cool.  If recipe calls for unbaked pie shell, just chill for about 1 hour.

title: Chocolate Wafer Crust
instructions: Mix crumbs and melted butter or margarine until well blended.  Press into an 8 or 9 inch pie plate.  Chill until firm.

title: Coconut Crust
ingredients: 1 ½ cups Nuts, coconut meat, dried (desiccated), sweetened, flaked, packaged
instructions: Mix coconut and butter or margarine together.  Press mixture into an 8 or 9 inch pie plate.
Bake at 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) for 15 minutes, or until golden.

title: Cornflake Crust
ingredients: 1 ½ cups Cereals ready-to-eat, KELLOGG, KELLOGG'S Corn Flakes
instructions: Mix cornflakes, sugar, and butter or margarine together thoroughly.  Press into an 8 or 9 inch pie plate.  Chill.

title: Meringue Crust
ingredients: ¼ teaspoon Leavening agents, cream of tartar
instructions: In a large bowl, beat egg whites, cream of tartar, and salt until soft peaks form.  Add vanilla, and slowly beat in sugar until very stiff and glossy.  Spread mixture into a 9 inch pie plate to form a shell.
Bake at 300 degrees F (150 degrees C) for 50 minutes.  Turn oven off, and leave meringue in oven for 1 hour.  Cool.

title: Blue Ribbon Mincemeat Pie Filling
ingredients: 3 ¼ pounds Beef, ground, lean, (approximately 21% fat), raw
instructions: In a large skillet over medium heat, cook the ground beef thoroughly. Being sure not to over-brown it.
Place chopped apples and the cooked ground beef in a food processor and pulse until the mixture is made up of pea sized chunks.
In a non-reactive skillet combine the apple and ground beef mixture with the raisins, brandy, ground cinnamon, ground allspice, ground nutmeg and the white sugar. Simmer for 30 minutes.
Cool filling to lukewarm and pour into freezer bags (2 cups per bag). Freeze filling until needed. One baggie will fill one 8 inch double crust pie. Thaw filling before using.

title: Pineapple Chess Pie
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) can Pineapple, canned, heavy syrup pack, solids and liquids, CRUSHED
⅓ cup Milk, reduced fat, fluid, 2% milkfat, with added vitamin A
1 recipe Pie crust, standard-type, prepared from recipe, unbaked
instructions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).

Mix the white sugar, cornmeal, eggs, melted butter, lemon juice, and the undrained crushed pineapple mixed with enough milk to make 3/4 cup. Do not over beat. Pour filling into one 9-inch unbaked pie shell.

Bake pie at 425 degrees F (220 degrees C) for 10 minutes. Reduce heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and continue baking until set and golden. This should take about 40 minutes. Serve pie at room temperature.

title: Pineapple Mango Pie
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) can Pineapple, canned, juice pack, solids and liquids
5 tablespoons Minute Tapioca Pudding Mix-Dry KFT
1 recipe Pie crust, standard-type, prepared from recipe, unbaked
instructions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (205 degrees C).
Mix the mangos, drained crushed pineapple, white sugar, brown sugar, apple juice, and tapioca. Let stand in a bowl for 20 minutes.
Pour filling into the unbaked pie shell, and dot with butter or margarine. Cover with top crust, and seal edges. Cut slits in top of outer crust.
Bake at 400 degrees F (205 degrees C) for 1 hour, or until bubbles burst slowly and crust is a nice golden brown color. Let pie cool, and serve at room temperature.

title: Pineapple Sour Cream Pie
ingredients: ¼ cup Wheat flour, white, all-purpose, enriched, bleached
1 (15 ounce) can Pineapple, canned, juice pack, solids and liquids
¼ teaspoon Leavening agents, cream of tartar
1 (9 inch) Pie crust, cookie-type, prepared from recipe, graham cracker, baked
instructions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Separate the eggs.

Combine 3/4 cup white sugar, flour, salt, crushed pineapple, sour cream, and lemon juice in a saucepan. Cook over medium heat, stirring frequently, until the mixture is thick and bubbly. Gradually pour the cooked pineapple mixture into the beaten egg yolks, whisking constantly; return mixture to the saucepan. Continue to cook, stirring constantly, for 2 to 3 minutes longer. Remove from heat and let cool.
Beat egg whites, vanilla and cream of tartar until soft peaks form. Gradually stir in the remaining 1/3 cup sugar and continue to beat egg whites until stiff and glossy.
Spoon cooled filling into graham wafer crust and top with the meringue. Bake in preheated oven for 12 minutes or until golden. Let pie cool and serve.

title: Lemonade Pie I
ingredients: 1 ¾ cups Milk, reduced fat, fluid, 2% milkfat, with added vitamin A
2 (3.5 ounce) packages Desserts, puddings, vanilla, dry mix, instant
1 (6 ounce) can Lemonade, frozen concentrate, white
1 (8 ounce) container Dessert topping, semi solid, frozen
1 (9 inch) Pie crust, cookie-type, prepared from recipe, graham cracker, baked
instructions: Pour milk into large bowl. Add pudding mixes, and beat with whisk for 30 seconds. Add lemonade concentrate, and beat with whisk for an additional 30 seconds. Stir in whipped topping, and pour filling into crust. Top with lemon slices.
Chill several hours, until thick enough to slice.

title: King Kamehameha Pie
ingredients: 1 ½ cups Pineapple juice, canned, unsweetened, without added ascorbic acid
1 (9 inch) Pie crust, standard-type, prepared from recipe, baked
instructions: In large saucepan, combine l  l/4 cup pineapple juice and sugar.  Bring to a boil, and add apples.  Cover, and simmer until apples are tender but not soft - 3 to 4 minutes.  Lift apples from syrup, and set aside.

Combine cornstarch with remaining 1/4 cup pineapple juice, and add to syrup in pan.   Cook, stirring constantly, until thick and bubbly; cook one minute more.  Remove pan from heat.  Stir butter or margarine, vanilla, and salt into the syrup.  Cool 10 minutes without stirring.
Pour about half of the syrup into baked pie shell, spreading it to cover bottom evenly.  Arrange cooked apples over syrup in crust.  Spoon remaining syrup over apples.  Chill.

title: Ice Cream Pie Shell
ingredients: 1 cup Peanut butter, smooth style, with salt
4 cups Cereals ready-to-eat, GENERAL MILLS, COCOA PUFFS
instructions: Mix peanut butter, corn syrup, and puffed cereal together.  Pat into a 10 inch pie plate.

title: Million Dollar Pie I
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) can Milk, canned, condensed, sweetened
1 (12 ounce) container Dessert topping, semi solid, frozen
1 (20 ounce) can Pineapple, canned, juice pack, solids and liquids
1 (11 ounce) can Mandarin Oranges In Light Syrup-Cnd DLM
1 (21 ounce) can Pie fillings, canned, cherry
2 (9 inch) Pie crust, cookie-type, prepared from recipe, graham cracker, baked
instructions: In a medium bowl, combine condensed milk and lemon juice. Fold in whipped topping.
In a separate bowl, mix together pineapple, oranges and cherry pie filling. Gently fold mixture into condensed milk mixture.
Pour entire mixture into pie crusts. Cover and refrigerate overnight.

title: Sour Cream Raisin Pie I
ingredients: 1 (9 inch) Pie crust, standard-type, frozen, ready-to-bake, baked
instructions: In a large saucepan, combine sugar, cornstarch, and salt.  Beat eggs, and add with 1 1/2 cups sour cream, raisins, and lemon juice to the saucepan.  Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until thickened.  Pour custard into pie shell.  Cool.
Spread remaining 1/2 cup sour cream over cooled filling.  Refrigerate several hours, until thoroughly chilled.

title: Sour Cream Raisin Pie II
ingredients: 1 tablespoon Wheat flour, white, all-purpose, enriched, bleached
1 recipe (10 inch) pie crust, from recipe
instructions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F ( 190 degrees C).
Roll out the pastry for the shell, and fit into a 10 inch pan.  Sprinkle the raisins over the bottom of the crust.

Combine the egg yolks, egg, sour cream, syrup, sugar, nutmeg, vanilla, and flour in a bowl.  Mix just until blended, not too much.  Pour filling into the shell.  Sprinkle a little more nutmeg on top.  Bake 30 to 35 minutes, or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean.  Cool, and then chill the pie.

title: Sour Cream Raisin Pie III
instructions: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
In a large bowl, beat eggs lightly.  Stir in sugar, salt, and spices.  Stir in sour cream and raisins.  Pour filling into  pastry shell.
Bake for 10 minutes, then reduce heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).  Bake for an additional 30 minutes, or until a knife inserted in center comes out dry.  Serve warm.

title: Cranberry Pie I
ingredients: 1 recipe Pie crust, standard-type, prepared from recipe, unbaked
2 tablespoons Wheat flour, white, all-purpose, enriched, bleached
instructions: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C). Line a 9 inch pie pan with pastry, and save remaining pastry for the top. Refrigerate both while you make the filling.

Chop cranberries coarsely. Combine with raisins, flour, sugar, water, and vanilla. Place filling in chilled pie shell. Cover with top crust, slash top in several places, and crimp edges together securely.
Bake in preheated oven) for 10 minutes. Reduce oven temperature to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C), and continue baking for 30 minutes. Cool before serving.

title: Lauriee's Coconut Custard Pie
ingredients: 1 (3.5 ounce) package Nuts, coconut meat, dried (desiccated), sweetened, flaked, packaged
1 (12 fluid ounce) can Milk, canned, evaporated, with added vitamin A
2 eaches Pie crust, standard-type, prepared from recipe, unbaked
instructions: Blend the eggs, sugar, and cornstarch.  Add the melted butter, milk, and vanilla; stir well.  Pour filling into pie shells.  Sprinkle with coconut.
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 35 to 45 minutes, or until firm.

title: Pineapple Pie I
ingredients: 1 (9 inch) prepared 9 inch deep dish pie crust
1 tablespoon Wheat flour, white, all-purpose, enriched, bleached
¾ cup Nuts, coconut meat, dried (desiccated), sweetened, flaked, packaged
¾ cup Pineapple, canned, juice pack, solids and liquids
instructions: In a small bowl, mix sugar and flour.  Stir in coconut.
In a larger bowl, beat eggs lightly.  Mix in pineapple, and then coconut mixture.  Add melted butter, and mix well.  Pour filling into deep dish pie crust.
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 45 to 60 minutes.

title: Vinegar Pie IV
ingredients: ¼ cup Wheat flour, white, all-purpose, enriched, bleached
1 recipe Pie crust, standard-type, prepared from recipe, unbaked
instructions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C.)
In a large bowl, beat the egg yolks and sugar. Stir in the melted butter and flour.  Add the lemon juice, water, and vinegar; mix together until filling is smooth.  Pour into pie shell.
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 45 minutes, or until knife inserted in the center comes out clean.

title: Cappuccino Tarts
ingredients: 12 (3 inch) Ready Crust Pastry Tart Shell-3" KBLR
1 cup Milk, reduced fat, fluid, 2% milkfat, with added vitamin A
instructions: In a small bowl, beat together eggs, coffee liqueur, and sugar.

In a small saucepan, combine milk and coffee granules; heat over medium high heat for 2 to 3 minutes, until milk is steaming and tiny bubbles appear around edge of saucepan.  Beat milk into eggs.  Strain egg mixture through sieve into a pitcher.  Carefully pour egg mixture into tart shells, filling evenly (tarts will be very full).  Sprinkle each tart with a little cinnamon.
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees) for 20 to 25 minutes, or until filling is set and tart shells are golden brown.  Cool before serving.

title: Fresh Pear Pie
ingredients: 1 recipe Pie crust, standard-type, prepared from recipe, unbaked
3 tablespoons Wheat flour, white, all-purpose, enriched, bleached
instructions: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C). Place a baking sheet on the bottom oven rack.
Combine sugar, flour, salt, cinnamon, and lemon zest in mixing bowl. Roll out half the pastry and line a 9-inch pie pan.
Arrange pear slices in layers in the pastry-lined pan, sprinkling the sugar mixture over each layer. Dot with butter and sprinkle with lemon juice.

Roll out remaining dough for the top crust. Use your finger dipped in a small bowl of water to moisten the rim of the bottom crust. Place top crust over filling, and trim edge using kitchen shears or a sharp paring knife. Fold edge under bottom crust, pressing to seal. Flute edge. Cut slits in top crust to allow steam to escape.

Bake in the preheated oven on the baking sheet for 10 minutes. Reduce oven temperature to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C), and bake until crust is golden brown and filling is bubbly, 35 to 40 minutes longer. Allow to cool several hours before serving.

title: Carrot Spice Pie
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can Carrots, canned, no salt added, drained solids
¼ cup Honey, strained or extracted
1 recipe Pie crust, standard-type, prepared from recipe, unbaked
instructions: Combine carrots, butter, honey, vanilla extract, salt, eggs and spices in a mixing bowl.  Mix together thoroughly with an electric mixer; mix until smooth.  Fold in white and brown sugars.  Pour filling into pastry crust.
Bake at 350 degrees F ( 175 degrees C) for 50 to 60 minutes. To determine if pie is done, insert toothpick.  If it comes out clean it is ready.

title: Peanut Buttery Chocolate Pie
ingredients: 1 cup Peanut butter, smooth style, with salt
1 cup Wheat flour, white, all-purpose, enriched, bleached
⅔ cup Honey, strained or extracted
1 cup NESTLE® TOLL HOUSE® Semi-Sweet Chocolate Morsels
½ cup peanut butter baking chips
1 (9 inch) Pie crust, cookie-type, prepared from recipe, graham cracker, baked
instructions: Combine peanut butter, honey, vanilla extract, and confectioners' sugar in a mixing bowl.  Mix with an electric mixer thoroughly.  Combine flour and brown sugar, and fold into the peanut butter mixture.  Fold peanut butter chips into the pie filling.

In a microwave-safe bowl, microwave chocolate chips until melted. Stir occasionally until chocolate is smooth. Spread chocolate evenly over the bottom of the graham cracker crust.  Pour the pie filling into the crust, spreading it evenly.  Chill and serve.

title: Lemon Chess Pie I
ingredients: ½ cup Milk, reduced fat, fluid, 2% milkfat, with added vitamin A
1 recipe Pie crust, standard-type, prepared from recipe, unbaked
instructions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
Combine eggs, sugar, cornmeal, melted butter, milk, and lemon juice in a large bowl. Mix until sugar is dissolved, but do not beat. Pour filling into unbaked pie shell.
Bake at 425 degrees F (220 degrees C) for 10 minutes. Reduce temperature to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C), and continue to bake until set, about 45 minutes more. Serve at room temperature.

title: Fresh Fruit Cobbler
ingredients: ¼ cup Milk, reduced fat, fluid, 2% milkfat, with added vitamin A
1 cup Wheat flour, white, all-purpose, enriched, bleached
1 teaspoon Leavening agents, baking powder, double-acting, sodium aluminum sulfate
instructions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a 2 quart baking dish.

Arrange the peaches, apple, pear, blueberries, cherries, and plums in the prepared baking dish. In a medium bowl, beat egg, sugar, and milk. In a separate bowl, sift together flour, baking powder, and salt; stir into the egg mixture. Stir in vanilla and melted butter. Cover the fruit with the batter mixture.
Bake 30 minutes in the preheated oven. Cobbler should be bubbly and lightly browned. Serve warm.

title: Magic Lemon Pie
ingredients: 1 (9 inch) Pie crust, cookie-type, prepared from recipe, graham cracker, baked
1 (14 ounce) can Milk, canned, condensed, sweetened
¼ teaspoon Leavening agents, cream of tartar
instructions: Blend sweetened condensed milk and egg yolks together.  Gradually add lemon juice, stirring until mixture thickens and is well blended.   Pour filling into crust.

In another bowl, beat room temperature egg whites with cream of tartar until foamy.  Gradually add sugar, and continue beating until egg whites are stiff.   Carefully spread meringue over filling, sealing the edges.
Bake at 400 degrees F (205 degrees C) until meringue browns, about 6 minutes. Cool.  Refrigerate uneaten portions.

title: Chicken Pot Pie I
ingredients: 4 Chicken, broilers or fryers, breast, meat only, raw
1 (10.75 ounce) can Soup, cream of chicken, canned, condensed, commercial
2 (15 ounce) cans Vegetables, mixed, canned, solids and liquids
1 recipe Pie crust, standard-type, prepared from recipe, unbaked
instructions: Boil or steam the chicken breasts until done.  Dice.
Mix together undiluted soup, canned vegetables, and diced chicken. Pour mixture into pie shell, and cover with the second crust. Crimp the edges, and make slits in the top crust.
Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 45 minutes, or until crust is golden brown.

title: Blueberry Grunt
ingredients: 2 (15 ounce) cans Blueberries, canned, heavy syrup, solids and liquids
1 ½ cups Wheat flour, white, all-purpose, enriched, bleached
2 teaspoons Leavening agents, baking powder, double-acting, sodium aluminum sulfate
¾ cup Milk, reduced fat, fluid, 2% milkfat, with added vitamin A
½ cup Cream, fluid, heavy whipping
instructions: Pour blueberries and their juice into a 10 inch iron skillet or kettle. Stir in sugar. Cook until juice begins to boil, and lower heat.

In medium mixing bowl, mix flour, baking powder, lemon rind, spices, and salt. Stir in milk until dry particles are just moistened. Drop dough by spoonfuls (8 dumplings) on top of simmering berry mixture, and cover skillet.  Cook over medium-low heat until dough is puffed and cooked through. Serve dumplings with berry sauce and cold cream.

title: Flaky and Tasty Pastry
ingredients: 4 ½ cups Wheat flour, white, all-purpose, enriched, bleached
1 teaspoon Leavening agents, baking powder, double-acting, sodium aluminum sulfate
instructions: Beat the egg in a measuring cup.  Add the vinegar and enough cold water to make one cup of liquid.

In a large bowl combine the flour, baking powder, salt, and brown sugar.  Cut the lard up into small cubes, and add to the dry ingredients.  Blend with two knives, or a pastry blender, until the mixture is crumbly.  Add the liquid ingredients, mixing with a knife.  Do not use your hands as it tends to soften the lard too much.  Add additional water, if required, to make a soft ball of dough.  If the weather is warm, refrigerate your dough for 1/2 hour to chill it before rolling.  Warm dough doesn't roll as well, and requires too much flour, which makes it less flaky.

title: Blackberry Pie I
ingredients: ½ cup Wheat flour, white, all-purpose, enriched, bleached
1 recipe Pie crust, standard-type, prepared from recipe, unbaked
2 tablespoons Milk, reduced fat, fluid, 2% milkfat, with added vitamin A
instructions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).

Combine 3 1/2 cups berries with the sugar and flour. Spoon the mixture into an unbaked pie shell. Spread the remaining 1/2 cup berries on top of the sweetened berries, and cover with the top crust. Seal and crimp the edges, and cut vents in the top crust for steam to escape.
Brush the top crust with milk, and sprinkle with 1/4 cup sugar.

Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes. Reduce the temperature of the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C), and bake for an additional 20 to 25 minutes, or until the filling is bubbly and the crust is golden brown. Cool on wire rack.

title: Limeade Pie
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) can Milk, canned, condensed, sweetened
1 (8 ounce) container Dessert topping, semi solid, frozen
1 (9 inch) Pie crust, cookie-type, prepared from recipe, graham cracker, baked
instructions: Mix limeade (may substitute lemonade concentrate) and sweetened condensed milk in a large bowl.  Fold in nondairy whipped topping.  Pour filling into graham cracker crust.  Chill 2 to 3 hours.

title: Lemonade Pie II
ingredients: 1 (9 inch) prepared 9 inch deep dish pie crust
1 (6 ounce) can Lemonade, frozen concentrate, white
1 (8 ounce) can Pineapple, canned, juice pack, solids and liquids
1 (14 ounce) can Milk, canned, condensed, sweetened
1 (8 ounce) container Dessert topping, semi solid, frozen
instructions: In a large bowl, mix lemonade, crushed pineapple, and sweetened condensed milk.  Fold in whipped topping.  Pour filling into pie crust, and freeze. Serve frozen.

title: Lemonade Pie III
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) can Lemonade, frozen concentrate, white
1 (8 ounce) container Dessert topping, semi solid, frozen
1 (14 ounce) can Milk, canned, condensed, sweetened
1 (9 inch) Pie crust, cookie-type, prepared from recipe, graham cracker, baked
instructions: In a large bowl, mix together concentrate and sweetened condensed milk.  Fold in whipped topping.  Pour filling into crust, and chill before serving.

title: Blackberry Pie II
ingredients: 1 recipe Pie crust, standard-type, prepared from recipe, unbaked
instructions: Mix tapioca flour and sugar together, and blend mixture into the berries.

Line a pie dish with pastry.  Pour filling into pie shell, and cover with top crust.  Seal edges by pinching or fluting the edge.  Brush top with egg white and sprinkle with a little sugar.  Cut slits in top to allow steam to escape.
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 30 to 40 minutes, until pie is golden brown and bubbly.

title: Concord Grape Pie I
ingredients: 1 recipe Pie crust, standard-type, prepared from recipe, unbaked
5 cups Grapes, american type (slip skin), raw
¼ cup Wheat flour, white, all-purpose, enriched, bleached
instructions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Place a sheet pan on the lower oven rack.

Wash and stem grapes; squeeze grapes out of their skins. Save the skins and set aside. Place grape pulp in a large saucepan; mash a few at the bottom to release their juice. Cook over medium-low heat until grapes come to a full boil. Remove pulp from heat, and press through a food mill to remove seeds. Combine pulp and skins in a large bowl. Stir in lemon juice.

In a separate bowl, mix sugar, flour, and salt. Stir into grape mixture. Pour filling into pastry crust, and dot with butter. Cover with second pastry shell. Flute edges, and cut little slits in the top crust for steam to escape.
In preheated oven on sheet pan for 45 to 50 minutes, or until crust is brown and juice begins to bubble through slits in top crust. Allow to cool before serving.

title: Mud Pie II
ingredients: ½ cup Cream, fluid, heavy whipping
4 (1 ounce) squares Bakers Choc Semi-Sweet Chocolate Bar KFT
¼ cup Cocoa, dry powder, unsweetened
4 cups Frozen desserts, ice cream, vanilla
instructions: Combine chocolate wafer crumbs and melted butter. Press the mixture into the bottom and partially up the sides of a 9-inch springform pan.

To Make Caramel Sauce: In a saucepan, combine 1/2 cup sugar and 3 tablespoons water. Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until sugar is completely dissolved. Increase the heat to medium and bring the sugar syrup to a boil; stop stirring at this point. While the syrup is boiling, brush down the sides of the pan from time to time to prevent sugar crystals from forming--use a clean pastry brush dipped in a mug of cold water.

Continue boiling without stirring until the syrup turns a light amber color. Remove the pan from the heat, and stir in the hot cream. Continue stirring, over low heat if necessary, until all for the caramel is dissolved into the cream.  Stir in 4 tablespoons butter or margarine, and set aside to cool slightly. Pour warm caramel sauce over the crust.  Freeze until firm, about 30 minutes.

To Make Espresso Fudge Sauce: Combine chocolate, cocoa, 4 tablespoons butter, and espresso in a saucepan.  Stir over low heat until smooth. Add 3/4 cup sugar and corn syrup; increase heat to medium, and stir until the sugar dissolves. Increase heat until the sauce reaches a low boil. Cook without stirring until the mixture thickens, 12 to 15 minutes.  Remove espresso fudge sauce from the heat, and cool to room temperature.  Pour 1 cup of the sauce over the frozen caramel layer, and return the crust to the freezer. Keep remaining sauce just warm enough so that it remains pourable.

Spread the softened ice cream over the caramel layer. Return pie to the freezer until firm, about 1 hour.  Pour the remaining fudge sauce over the ice cream layer; freeze until firm, about 2 to 3 hours. Wrap a hot wet towel around the springform pan for about 2 minutes, then remove the sides of the pan.

title: Cherry Crumble
ingredients: 1 ⅛ cups Wheat flour, white, all-purpose, enriched, bleached
½ cup oats, rolled, regular, dry
1 (21 ounce) can Pie fillings, canned, cherry
instructions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

Melt butter or margarine in a large saucepan.  Remove pan from heat; stir in oats, flour, brown sugar, and salt until a dry, crumbly dough forms.  Press about 2/3 of the dough into the bottom of 9 inch square pan, making a firm even layer.
Spread cherry pie filling in the crust, and sprinkle with remaining crumb mixture.
Bake for 40 to 45 minutes, until top is lightly browned.  Serve warm or at room temperature.

title: Green Tomato Pie I
ingredients: 1 recipe Pie crust, standard-type, prepared from recipe, unbaked
3 tablespoons Wheat flour, white, all-purpose, enriched, bleached
instructions: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
Prepare pie plate with bottom layer of crust.

Mix together the flour, lemon peel, lemon juice, butter, ground cinnamon, sugar, and salt. Stir in the green tomatoes to coat. Pour into crust. Cover with top crust. Cut slits in top crust  to allow steam to escape.

Bake at 450 degrees F (230 degrees C) for 10 minutes, then reduce temperature  to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and bake another 30 minutes or until crust is golden and filling is bubbly. Allow pie to cool before serving.

title: Buttermilk Pie I
ingredients: 1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch single crust pie
instructions: Mix sugar and flour. Add buttermilk, beaten eggs, vanilla. Melt the butter over low heat. Add to buttermilk mixture and mix well.
Pour into pie crust and bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 35 - 40 minutes.

title: Banbury Tarts
instructions: Chop the figs as fine as possible, measure to 1 cup, and pour boiling water over to cover.  Allow to stand for 45 minutes.  Drain very well.
Beat the egg and sugar together.  Stir in the figs, peel, raisins, and nuts.  Fill tart shells 3/4 full with fruit filling.
Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 20 to 25 minutes. Cool on racks.

title: Green Tomato Pie II
ingredients: 1 recipe Pie crust, standard-type, prepared from recipe, unbaked
2 tablespoons Wheat flour, white, all-purpose, enriched, bleached
instructions: Mix sugar, flour, cinnamon, and nutmeg together.  Sprinkle over sliced tomatoes, coating them.  Pour into pastry lined dish.  Dot with butter or margarine.  Cover with second crust, fluting edges.  Cut three or four slits in top to allow steam to escape.
Bake at 375 degree F (190 degrees C) for 35 to 40 minutes.

title: Peanut Butter Pie VI
ingredients: ⅓ cup Peanut butter, smooth style, with salt
2 cups Milk, reduced fat, fluid, 2% milkfat, with added vitamin A
1 (9 inch) Pie crust, standard-type, prepared from recipe, baked
instructions: Mix together 2/3 cup white sugar and peanut butter.  Sprinkle 2/3 of the mixture into baked pie shell.
Combine 1/2 cup sugar, corn starch, salt, milk, and egg yolks in a medium saucepan.  Cook and stir over medium low heat until thick.  Pour filling over peanut butter mixture in pie shell.
In a clean glass bowl, beat  egg whites until very stiff.   Spread meringue on top of pie.  Sprinkle remaining peanut butter crumbs on top of the egg whites.
Bake at 400 degrees F (205 degrees C) for 5 to 7 minutes, or until the meringue is golden brown.

title: Red, White, and Blueberry Cheesecake Pie
ingredients: ½ cup Kraft Strawberry Jelly KFT
instructions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).

On a flat surface, place one sheet of phyllo dough. Brush it with melted butter, and cover with another piece of phyllo. Repeat until all 8 sheets are used. Using kitchen scissors, cut layered phyllo into a 12- to 13-inch circle. Carefully press circle into a greased 9-inch pie plate; gently fan edges. Bake in preheated oven until edges are just golden, 6 to 8 minutes; cool slightly on a wire rack. Reduce oven temperature to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

In a medium bowl, beat cream cheese, sugar, and vanilla with an electric mixer until light and fluffy. Beat in eggs until well combined. Fold in 1 cup of blueberries. Pour filling into prepared crust.

Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) until set, 40 to 50 minutes. To prevent the crust from over-browning, gently cover pie with foil for the last 25 minutes of baking. Cool completely on a wire rack.
In a small bowl, beat jelly until smooth; spread over cheese filling. Arrange 1 cup blueberries on top in a star pattern.

title: Apple Crumble Pie
ingredients: 1 (9 inch) prepared 9 inch deep dish pie crust
¾ cup Wheat flour, white, all-purpose, enriched, bleached
instructions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C.)
Arrange apple slices in unbaked pie shell. Mix 1/2 cup sugar and cinnamon; sprinkle over apples.
Mix 1/3 cup sugar with flour; cut in butter until crumbly. Spoon mixture over apples.
Bake in preheated oven until apples are soft and top is lightly browned, about 40 minutes.

title: Chicken in Every Pot Pie
ingredients: 4 cups Chicken, roasting, light meat, meat only, cooked, roasted
1 ½ cups Soup, chicken broth, canned, prepared with equal volume water, commercial
1 ½ cups Peas, green, frozen, unprepared
1 (10.75 ounce) can Soup, cream of mushroom, canned, condensed, commercial
1 ¼ cups Milk, reduced fat, fluid, 2% milkfat, with added vitamin A
instructions: In a saucepan combine chicken, broth, peas, carrots, soup, salt and pepper.  Bring to a boil, stirring occasionally.
Meanwhile, combine biscuit mix, milk. garlic powder and celery seed (mixture will be thin).
Pour hot chicken mixture into 9x13 greased oven proof dish. Immediately spoon biscuit mixture evenly over the top of chicken mixture. Sprinkle with paprika.
Bake, uncovered at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)  for 30-35 minutes or until topping is golden brown.

title: सेव पूरी (sev poori)
ingredients: नमक स्वादानुसार, लाल मिर्च स्वादानुसार, काली मिर्च स्वादानुसार,
instructions: अब एक प्लेट में पापड़ी लगाऐआलू को उबाल लें और प्याज को बारीक काट लेंआलू को धोकर छिल कर कदूकस कर लें
अब पापड़ी पर आलू लगा लेंअब उस पर चाट मसाला डालें अब बारीक कटी प्याज डालें
अब उस पर मीठी चटनी और अनार दाना डालेंनमक मिर्च डालें
अब दही डालें और चटनी और सेव डालें
अब सर्व करें सेव पूरी तैयार

title: Dimsum Goreng Viral
instructions: Tumis baput sampai wangi (api sedang), setelah itu masukkan telur dan tumis.
Tambahkan air agar tdk kering (aduk), masukkan cabai, saus tomat, kecap, saori, saus bangkok dan garam (aduk) dan cicip rasa.
Setelah rasa pas, masukkan dimsum (aduk), kemudian masukan tauge dan sawi tunggu hingga sayur agak layu.
Selesai dimsum goreng siap dinikmati 🤤

title: หมูกรอบหม้อทอดไร้น้ำมัน
ingredients: หมูสามชั้น
เกลือ 1 ช้อนชา
น้ำส้มสายชู
instructions: ใส่เกลือ 1 ช้อนชาในน้ำ ใส่น้ำพอท่วมหนังหมู
ต้มประมาณ 15 นาที
นำส้อมมาจิ้มหนังหมูให้ทั่ว บั้งด้านหนังประมาณ 1 นิ้ว เป็นทางยาว แล้วทาเกลือให้ทั่ว
นำไปแช่น้ำส้มสายชูเฉพาะด้านหนัง 15 นาที
อบด้านหนัง 50 องศา 1/2 ขม.
พักให้เย็น แล้ว อบด้านหนังที่ 100 องศา 1/2 ชม.
แช่ตู้เย็นข้ามคืน
เอาออกมาผึ่งลมให้หายเย็น
อบด้านหนัง 200 องศา 30 นาที

title: Kwetiau Pedas Gochujang #homemadebylita
instructions: Siapkan bahan. Rebus air hingga mendidih, masukkan kwetiau kering dan diamkan selama 2-3 menit. Kemudian aduk perlahan hingga lunak, tiriskan dan siram air dingin. Lalu tiriskan kembali dan campur dengan bahan saus hingga merata.
Tumis bawang hingga wangi, tuang udang dan tofu, aduk merata. Masukkan kwetiau yg td uda dicampur. Masak hingga kuah menyusut. Koreksi rasa sesuai selera ya.
Tambahkan parsley dan biji wijen sbagai garnish. Siap disajikan 😍

title: ફરારી ભાખરી
instructions: રાજગરાના લૉટ માં નિમક મરી પાવડર આદૂ મરચાંની પેસ્ટ ને જોતું દહિથી અથવા છાશ થી ભાખરીનાલોટ થી સહેજ ઢીલો લૉટ બાંધવો પછી ચકલા ઉપર સહેજ ઓટામણ લય ભાખરી વણી ઠીકરીની તવી માં ભાખરી સેકવી તે ચા સાથે સરસ લાગેછેતો તૈયાર ફરારી ભાખરી

title: Sinh tố bơ mãng cầu rắc chia cho bé +9m tuổi
ingredients: 120 ml sữa công thức pha tỉ lệ 1/2
instructions: Cho cơm của bơ + mãng cầu nhặt sạch hạt + 120ml sữa công thức vào xay xong cho ra chén rắc chia và cho bé thưởng thức thôi. đơn giản phải không nào, chúc các mẹ thành công nhé ^^

title: কসৌরি উচ্ছে (kauri uchee recipe in bengali)
ingredients: ফোড়নের জন্য তেজপাতা শুকনো লঙ্কা পাঁচফোড়ন
instructions: প্রথমে কড়াইয়ে তেল দিয়ে পড়ুন গুলো সমস্ত দিয়ে এক সেকেন্ড নাড়াচাড়া করার পর তাতে উচ্ছে দিয়ে ভাজা ভাজা করতে হবে যখন উচ্ছের গায়ে লাল দাগ ধরবে তখন বাকি সবজি দিয়ে ভালো করে নাড়াচাড়া করতে হবে।
বাকি সবজির গায়ে লালচে দাগ হলে তখন একে একে সমস্ত মশলা দিয়ে ভালো করে কষিয়ে নিতে হবে কষানো হয়ে গেলে পরিমাণমতো জল দিয়ে ঢেকে দিতে হবে 10 মিনিটের জন্য।

10 মিনিট হয়ে গেলে ঢাকা খুলে দেখে নিতে হবে সবজি সিদ্ধ হয়েছে কিনা যদি সবজি সবজি সিদ্ধ হয়ে যায় এবং গেভি ও ঘন হয়ে আসে তখন কসৌরি মেথি হাতে ঘষে তরকারি র এর উপরে ছড়িয়ে দিতে হবে এবং চিনি দিয়ে ভাল করে মিশিয়ে নামিয়ে নিলেই তৈরি হয়ে গেল আমাদের কসৌরি উচ্ছে।

title: Perkedel tahu kuning
instructions: Haluskan tahu kuning
Kemudian masukkan telur, irisan bawang Bombay dan daun bawang, bawang merah dan bawang putih yang dihaluskan, merica bubuk, garam, gula dan kaldu sapi bubuk. Aduk sampai rata
Jika sudah teraduk rata, tambahkan tepung terigu lalu aduk lagi sampai rata
Bentuk bulat-bulat pipih kemudian goreng sampai berwarna ke emasan. Angkat dan tiriskan. Lalu sajikan

title: करोंदे की चटनी ।
instructions: करोंदे को धो ले अच्छे से ।और अब उनको आधा आधा काट कर बी ज निकाल दे ।
अब 1कटोरी धनिया पती काट ले,1टुकड़ा अदरक काट ले,और 3 हरी मिची भी काट ले ।
अब सब को मिक्सी के जार डाले,1चमच शक्कर,1चमच नमक डाल कर पीस ले ।चटनी तैयार ।ये चटनी बहुत ही फायदेमन्द और विटामिन c से भरपुर है ।

title: Gianni pizza tésztája
instructions: A meleg vízve teszem a cukrot majd bele tördelem az elesztőt. Megvarom mig felfut. Addig a lisztet össze keverem a sóval és bele kanalazom az oliva olajat. Majd a felfutott elesztőt is hozzá adom.
Addig dagasztom míg el nem válik az edény falátol. Majd 1,5 órára meleg helyre teszem kelni.
Jó sütögetést! ❣🍕❣

title: દૂધી ખીચડી (Gourd khichdi recipe in Gujarati)
ingredients: 250 ગ્રામ દૂધી (છાલ ઉતારી ને ટુકડા કરેલી)
instructions: દાળ-ચોખા ધોઈ ને પલાળી દો.
કુકર માં ઘી તેલ ગરમ મૂકી, રાઈ નાખો, તતળે એટલે હિંગ નાખી ડુંગળી, લસણ નાખી થોડા સાંતળો.
પછી દૂધી અને મરચું હળદર નાખો અને થોડું સાંતળો.
હવે પલાળેલા દાળ ચોખા ઉમેરી અને 3 ગણું પાણી નાખો.
હવે કિચન કિંગ મસાલા અને મીઠું નાખી ને ભેળવી લો.
કુકર નું ઢાંકણ બન્ધ કરી 3 સીટી વગાડી લો.
દહીં અને પાપડ સાથે ગરમ ગરમ પીરસો.

title: Tepung parut kelapa
instructions: Pasrah kelapa tersebut sebanyak yang anda suka
Setelah selesai mempasrah kelapa tsbt tuang tepung sekiranya lalu tambahkan gula
Tambahkan air sesuai kekentalan tepung saat diaduk
Lalu siapkan wajan dan goreng.. Disajikan saat hangat enak lo sis apalagi makannya pas malem
Selamat mencoba...

title: مسقعه بالدجاج
instructions: اقطع الباذنجان حلقات او بالطول وارش عليه ملح واتركه في المصفاة
اقطع البطاطا والفلفل الرومي والطماطم حلقات واقطع صدور الدجاج شرايح
ارش ملح وفلفل اسود على صدور الدجاج واقليهم بس يتغير لونهم
اقلي البطاطا مكان الدجاج واقلي الباذنحان بعد ما اغسله من الملح
ارص البطاطا والدجاج والطماطم والفلفل الرومي والباذنجان بالصينيه بشكل حلو ومرتب
في قدر اضع ماء مغلي وعلبة صلصه والماجي وجميع البهارات واتركهم يغلو بعدين اضعهم فوق صينية الباذنجان
اتركهم على نار هاديه لحد ما يتسبكو وتستوي المكونات كلها
تقدم مع رز ابيض او تغمس بالخبز وصحه وعافيه

title: Sayur oyong wortel
instructions: Tumis bumbu halus lalu tambahkan bwang yang diiris
Lalu tambahkan ayam aduk rta tambahkan air secukupnya tunggu sampai mendidih
Masukan wortel dan oyong adak rata
Tambahkan garam dan penyedap aduk rta
Masukan seledri dan bwang pere aduk rta
Masak sampai wortel dan oyong agak lunak
Masukan mie jagung..sesudah masak salin kepiring saji lalu taburkan bwang goreng

title: Dry Paneer Tikka
instructions: Take thick curd, add all spices along with salt.
Mix it well. Now add onion petals, cubed capsicum, sliced tomatoes, cubed paneer, also add 1tsp oil.
Coat all vegetables well. Now refrigerate for 30 minutes.
Now insert the marinated paneer, capsicum, onion and tomato into wooden sticks
Now roast ot on hot tawa.
Finally sprinkle some chaat masala amd and serve paneer tikka.

title: Kadedemes (Kulit Singkong/Kulit Sampeu)
ingredients: 2 Cabe Rawit (Suamiku bukan Penyuka pedas) heehe
instructions: Rebus dulu kadedemes nya sampai terendam panci sekitar 45 menit
Sudah sampe saat gini didinginin dl sampe bsa diiris iris kecil lagi
Ulek semua bahan kecuali gula merah,cabe merah dan daun bawang yaaa..
Tumis bahan yang diulek tadi dan diberi gula merah,cabe merah,dan daun bawang
Kalau sudah wangi bumbunya masukin kadedemes nya
Kasih air ya dikit setengah gelas kecil supaya dia tambah empuk lagi
Jgn lupa kasih garam & Penyedap rasa secukupnya
Tunggu hingga menyusut sambil koreksi rasa ya
Kadedemes siap dihidangkan jgn lupa kerupuknya hehehe
Ga bisa kalo ga pake nasi ehehehhee ✌️ selamat mencobaa 😊🤗

title: Ayam suir pedas manis
instructions: Rebus ayam bersama daun salam sampe empuk,angkat lalu goreng ayam sebentar terus suir2 ayam sampe hbs
Ulek kasar semua bahan bumbu
Tumis bumbu masukkan serai,daun jeruk,gula,garam,kaldu jamur & merica
Masukkan ayam suir aduk,tambahkan air sedikit biar bumbu nya meresap masak smpe air menyusut

title: Budae Jjigae Seafood, simple dan enak
instructions: Untuk gochujangnya dicampurin aja dan aduk rata. Sisihkan.
Bersihkan udang dan cumi. Potong2 seukuran sedang (biar bisa langsung masuk mulut). Sisihkan
Potong2 kimchi sekita 2-3cm. Btw kimchi aku cuma sawi putih aja.

Tumis baput n cabe sampe wangi, masukin air kira2 200ml, tunggu mendidih. Masukin kimchi aduk2, masukin bumbu gochujang, aduk rata tunggu mendidih. Masukin udang n cumi. Kalau udang n cumi udah matang lanjut masukin telur tunggu 2-3menit (tergantung selera elornya mau matang atau gak) selesaaiiii~
Kalau bisa telurnya jangan terlalu diaduk, 1-2x aja diaduk, kalau diaduk sampai hancur malah penampakkannya kayak seblak😅

title: प्रोटीन रीच हिरवेगार मटार सूप
instructions: प्रथम वाटणे, लसूण, मिरची, कांदा, कोथिंबीर हे सर्व दोन टेबल स्पून बटर वर एक मिनिट फ्राय करून घ्या

हे फ्राय केलेलं साहित्य मिक्सर मध्ये बारीक वाटून घेऊन परत कढईत दोन टेबल स्पून बटर घालून त्यावर ओता... आणि दोन मिनिटे उकळी काढून घ्या उकळी आल्यावर दोन टेबल स्पून दूध व अर्धा टी स्पून साखर घाला. चांगले एकजीव करून घ्या.
आता आपले मटार सूप तयार झाले. ते एका बाऊल मध्ये काढून त्यावर काळीमिरी पूड व कोथिंबीर घाला. आणि क्रीम घालून गरमागरम सर्व्ह करा..

title: બ્રાઉની વીથ આઈસ્ક્રીમ
ingredients: ચોકલેટ મંચ ઉપર સવૅ કરવા માટે
instructions: બ્રાઉની બનાવવા માટેની રીત-સૌપ્રથમ બિસ્કીટ ને મી‌‌ક્ષર માં ક્રશ કરી લો અને પછી તેમાં જરૂર મુજબ દુધ ઉમેરો ને બરાબર હલાવી લો (બેટર થીક રાખવા નું) અને પછી ઓવન મા બેક‌ કરી લો
બ્રાઉની બેક થ‌ઈ જાય એટલે તેને રૂમ ટેમ્પરેચર પર ઠંડુ થવા દો.
બ્રાઉની વીથ આઈસ્ક્રીમ સવૅ કરવા માટે ની રીત-સૌપ્રથમ એક ગ્લાસ માં બ્રાઉની મૂકી દો પછી તેમાં ચોકલેટ સીરપ નાખો પછી વેનીલા આઈસ્ક્રીમ મુકો પછી ચોકલેટ ચિપ્સ અને નાખી ને ઉપર થી ચોકલેટ મુકીને સવૅ કરો

title: КАБАЧКОВЫЙ ОМЛЕТ 🙃
instructions: Кабачок трем на крупной терке, добавляем яйца, солим перчим, добавляем молоко и муку, жарим с двух сторон
На одну сторону омлета кладем сыр и ветчину, накрываем другой стороной, ждем пока расплавиться сыр. Подаем с зеленью и семечками подсолнечника (по желанию)

title: Суп с «клёцками»
ingredients: КЛЁЦКИ:яйцо-2 шт, мука-2-3 столовые ложки(консистенция должна получится похожа на сметану)
instructions: Куриную грудку варить мин 30-35, лук и морковь обжарить, добавить к курице, варить до готовности куриной грудки, добавить картофель, минут за 10 до готовности картофеля, добавить клёцки..( клёцки накладывать по пол чайной ложечки, чтоб они не разварились на всю кастрюлю😄

title: Ikan kakap putih bakar saus kecap #homemadebylita
instructions: Lumuri ikan dgn jeruk nipis selama 10 menitan. Balut dgn bumbu halus dan marinasi selama 30 menit.
Campur bahan olesan dgn sisa bumbu ikan. Bakar di atas grill pan sambil dioles merata hingga matang. Sajikan dgn sambal kecap (bawang merah + cabe rawit + kecap manis). Yummy 😍

title: Tenggiri extra pedes
ingredients: 15 buah cabe rawit, 5 buah cabe kriting, ulek kasar
1 sdm kecap manis, sedikit gula merah, garam, kaldu jamur
instructions: Bersihkan ikan, potong2 beri garam, dan air jeruk nipis, diamkan 15 menit
Goreng ikan, jangan terlalu garing. Sisihkan
Tumis bawang, cabe, tomat, beri kecap manis, gula merah, garam dan kaldu jamur beri air sedikit.cicip
Masukkan ikan aduk sampai tercampur rata, angkat.

title: ผัดสะตอกุ้งสด #อย่างง่าย
ingredients: น้ำพริกกะปิ
instructions: แกะสะตอ
ล้างกุ้ง แกะเปลือกออก
ตั้งไฟ คั่วหมูบด รอจนหมูสุก ใส่น้ำพริกกะปิ ใส่กุ้งรวนนิดหน่อย
กุ้งสุกใส่สะตอ ดับไฟ

title: Tahu/tempe goreng bumbu ungkep
ingredients: Sisa bumbu ungkep ayam air kelapa
instructions: Cuci tahu kemudian potong tahu dan tempe sesuai selera ya
Didihkan sisa bumbu ungkep, tambahan garam, masukan tahu terlebih dulu, masak 5 menit, angkat dan tiriskan, kemudian setelah itu masukkan tempe masak juga 5 menit, angkat dan tiriskan
Tahu dan tempe siap digoreng, goreng diminyak panas ya, sampai kecoklatan
Selamat mencoba ❤️

title: Cireng Banjur Kuah Seblak
ingredients: 1-2 jeruk limau (selera suka asem apa engga)
instructions: Membuat cireng... Campur semua bahan cireng kireng aduk rata sisihkan

Masak biang cireng masukan air, garem, bawang putih halus, merica dan tepung aduk smp tak menggumpal (larut semua) baru nyalakan api (api sedang) aduk terus hingga adonan berubah warna memjadi bening, setelah itu angkat dan masukan ke bahan kering aduk2 selagi panas. Ulenin adonan biang dan kering hinga bisa d pulung2.. pasti masih ada sisah tepung gg masalah..
Tips menggoreng cireng : masukan cireng dr minyak dingin pake api kecil aja yah

Bumbu seblak haluskan semua bwg putih cabe2an kencur hingga halus tumis dengan minyak hingga harum..rebus air hingga mendidih masukan bumbu tumis tambahkan daun bawang dan bumbui dengan garam totele icipi siap di sajikan alias di banjur ke cireng yang sudah di goreng... selamat menikmati

title: Kue Bugis Ketan
instructions: Masak Gula merah, kelapa parut, sejumput garam dan pandan 3 helai
Campur tepung ketan, Gula, garam 1/2 sdt dan santan sedikit demi sedikit hingga tercampur rata
Bungkus dan kukus

title: Cháo sườn cho bé +10m
instructions: Sừơn non rửa sơ qua nứơc muối loãng xong đem hầm cho chín mềm, vớt phần sừơn ra rút xương phần nạc ta băm nhỏ, hoặc xay nhỏ (tùy vào độ ăn thô của bé). phần nứơc hầm xương ta cho cháo trắng vào nấu, xong ta cho phần thịt vào nấu cùng, nêm xíu hạt nêm cho bé, 1 xíu mắm cho bé.
Đợi cháo sôi lăn tăn ta cho 1 lòng đỏ trứng gà ta vào khuấy đều cho chín xong tắt bếp, cho 1 xíu dầu ăn cho bé vào nữa là xong, có thể cho thêm vào cọng ngò băm nhuyễn cho thơm nhé ^^

title: Kue mangkok
ingredients: Dimasak keduanya sampai gula larut saja
instructions: Campur semua bahan selain baking powder, aduk rata lalu diamkan 30 menit

Setelah 30 menit tambahkan baking powder aduk rata, tuang dalam cetakan kue mangkok tanpa dioles minyak, lalu kukus dengan api besar(sebelumnya kukusan di panaskan dulu sampai uangnya benar benar banyak,) selama mengukus jangan pernah dibuka, kukus sekitar 40 menit...biarkan dingin baru dikeluarkan dari cetakan...

title: मुंग दाल नाचोज
ingredients: 1/2 कटोरी घी या तेल मोयन के लिए
तलने के लिए तेल या रिफांइड
instructions: सबसे पहले आटा और घी को एक बर्तन में डाल कर अच्छी तरह से हाथ से मिला लें
अब सभी मसाले डालकर अच्छी तरह से मसल कर हाथ से मिला लें
अब पानी डाल कर अच्छी तरह से गुथ ले थोड़ा सा सख्त जिससे नाचोज अच्छी तरह से बने
अब आप छोटी लोई बना कर पुरी बेल कर पिज्जा कटर से तिकोना काट लें
अब आप कढ़ाई गर्म कर तेल डाल कर सभी कटे हुए तिकोना को सुनहरे रंग या कुरकुरे होने तक सेक ले
लीजिए तैयार है आप सभी के लिए मुंग दाल नाचोज ठंडा होने पर एयरटाइट डिब्बे में डाल कर अच्छी तरह से बंद कर दें जब भी मन हो खाने का बस गरमागरम चाय के खाते और खिलाये अपनी पसंद की कोई भी डिप के साथ
चलिए फिर मिलते हैं आप सभी से एक नयी व्यंजन के साथ तब तक के लिए नमस्कार🙏🏻🙏🏻 दोस्तों धन्यवाद

title: Tumis oncom teri
ingredients: 5 siung bwang merah, banyak karena bawang nya kecil2
instructions: Potong2 oncom berbentuk dadu, siapkan teri kemudian cuci bersih
Siapkan bumbu, lalu ulek hingga halus
Tumis bumbu yang sudah dihaluskan tadi
Jika bumbu sudah harum masukan teri, aduk2... kemudian masukan oncom aduk2 dan beri stengah gelas air
Masukan bumbu pelengkap, tunggu hingga air menyusut dan tes rasa, tumis oncom teri siap dihidangkan😊

title: Roti Maryam/Roti Cane
instructions: Lelehkan margarin utk bahan cair... Biarkan smp agak dingin
Setelah margarin agak dingin, campurkan semua bahan campuran adonan dn aduk2 pakai sendok atau wisk
Masukkan tepung dlm wadah (sisa sedikit buat cadangan jika adonan lembek,bs ditambahkan), tuang bahan campuran adonan yg sdh siap digunakan,,,apabila adonan agak keras bs ditambah sedikit air
Aduk merata dg spatula, lalu uleni hingga kalis, banting2 bbrp kali
Bagi adonan kira2 50gr atau sesuai selera aja...punya sy hasilnya 16 bh (bentuk bulatannya serapih mungkin agar tdk pecah dn kmasukan myk bg dlm)
Istirahatkan dlm rendaman minyak goreng selama 1,5 jam dlm wadah yg tertutup..agar elastis saat di bentuk
Keluarkan satu bulatan adonan dr rendaman myk kemudian pipihkan setipis mungkin dg rolling pin (sy pk tangan, krn gak punya rolling pin 😁),tp jgn smp sobek
Kemudian olesi margarin seluruh permukaan dn gulung memanjang,,, lalu gulung lagi membentuk huruf S,lipat dan tumpuk
Lakukan hingga adonan habis, istirahatkan lagi dlm wadah tertutup selama 1 jam
Setelah 1 jam, pipihkan dn panggang diatas teflon dg api kecil (agar matang merata dn tdk mudah gosong)
Lakukan hingga adonan hbs di panggang,,, tanda roti sdh matang akan timbul bercak2 kecoklatan
Angkat dn dinginkan,,stlh dingin masukkan dlm plastik satu persatu.. siap jd frozen food..bs tahan sampai berbulan2 maak.. ☺
Bs langsung dinikmati dg berbagai toping spt kari ayam/daging, madu, keju, cokelat dll sesuai kesukaannya apa.
Jika akan di nikmati dlm bentuk frozen food, diamkan dlm suhu ruang bbrp saat,kemudian panaskan di teflon dg api kecil

title: प्रोटीन रीच हिरवेगार मटार सूप
instructions: प्रथम वाटणे, लसूण, मिरची, कांदा, कोथिंबीर हे सर्व दोन टेबल स्पून बटर वर एक मिनिट फ्राय करून घ्या

Campur bahan olesan dgn sisa bumbu ikan. Bakar di atas grill pan sambil dioles merata hingga matang. Sajikan dgn sambal kecap (bawang merah + cabe rawit + kecap manis). Yummy 😍

title: Tenggiri extra pedes
ingredients: 15 buah cabe rawit, 5 buah cabe kriting, ulek kasar
1 sdm kecap manis, sedikit gula merah, garam, kaldu jamur
instructions: Bersihkan ikan, potong2 beri garam, dan air jeruk nipis, diamkan 15 menit
Goreng ikan, jangan terlalu garing. Sisihkan
Tumis bawang, cabe, tomat, beri kecap manis, gula merah, garam dan kaldu jamur beri air sedikit.cicip
Masukkan ikan aduk sampai tercampur rata, angkat.

title: ผัดสะตอกุ้งสด #อย่างง่าย
ingredients: น้ำพริกกะปิ
instructions: แกะสะตอ
ล้างกุ้ง แกะเปลือกออก
ตั้งไฟ คั่วหมูบด รอจนหมูสุก ใส่น้ำพริกกะปิ ใส่กุ้งรวนนิดหน่อย
กุ้งสุกใส่สะตอ ดับไฟ

title: Tahu/tempe goreng bumbu ungkep
ingredients: Sisa bumbu ungkep ayam air kelapa
instructions: Cuci tahu kemudian potong tahu dan tempe sesuai selera ya
Didihkan sisa bumbu ungkep, tambahan garam, masukan tahu terlebih dulu, masak 5 menit, angkat dan tiriskan, kemudian setelah itu masukkan tempe masak juga 5 menit, angkat dan tiriskan
Tahu dan tempe siap digoreng, goreng diminyak panas ya, sampai kecoklatan
Selamat mencoba ❤️

title: Cireng Banjur Kuah Seblak
ingredients: 1-2 jeruk limau (selera suka asem apa engga)
instructions: Membuat cireng... Campur semua bahan cireng kireng aduk rata sisihkan

Masak biang cireng masukan air, garem, bawang putih halus, merica dan tepung aduk smp tak menggumpal (larut semua) baru nyalakan api (api sedang) aduk terus hingga adonan berubah warna memjadi bening, setelah itu angkat dan masukan ke bahan kering aduk2 selagi panas. Ulenin adonan biang dan kering hinga bisa d pulung2.. pasti masih ada sisah tepung gg masalah..
Tips menggoreng cireng : masukan cireng dr minyak dingin pake api kecil aja yah

Bumbu seblak haluskan semua bwg putih cabe2an kencur hingga halus tumis dengan minyak hingga harum..rebus air hingga mendidih masukan bumbu tumis tambahkan daun bawang dan bumbui dengan garam totele icipi siap di sajikan alias di banjur ke cireng yang sudah di goreng... selamat menikmati

title: Kue Bugis Ketan
instructions: Masak Gula merah, kelapa parut, sejumput garam dan pandan 3 helai
Campur tepung ketan, Gula, garam 1/2 sdt dan santan sedikit demi sedikit hingga tercampur rata
Bungkus dan kukus

title: Cháo sườn cho bé +10m
instructions: Sừơn non rửa sơ qua nứơc muối loãng xong đem hầm cho chín mềm, vớt phần sừơn ra rút xương phần nạc ta băm nhỏ, hoặc xay nhỏ (tùy vào độ ăn thô của bé). phần nứơc hầm xương ta cho cháo trắng vào nấu, xong ta cho phần thịt vào nấu cùng, nêm xíu hạt nêm cho bé, 1 xíu mắm cho bé.
Đợi cháo sôi lăn tăn ta cho 1 lòng đỏ trứng gà ta vào khuấy đều cho chín xong tắt bếp, cho 1 xíu dầu ăn cho bé vào nữa là xong, có thể cho thêm vào cọng ngò băm nhuyễn cho thơm nhé ^^

title: Kue mangkok
ingredients: Dimasak keduanya sampai gula larut saja
instructions: Campur semua bahan selain baking powder, aduk rata lalu diamkan 30 menit

Setelah 30 menit tambahkan baking powder aduk rata, tuang dalam cetakan kue mangkok tanpa dioles minyak, lalu kukus dengan api besar(sebelumnya kukusan di panaskan dulu sampai uangnya benar benar banyak,) selama mengukus jangan pernah dibuka, kukus sekitar 40 menit...biarkan dingin baru dikeluarkan dari cetakan...

title: मुंग दाल नाचोज
ingredients: 1/2 कटोरी घी या तेल मोयन के लिए
तलने के लिए तेल या रिफांइड
instructions: सबसे पहले आटा और घी को एक बर्तन में डाल कर अच्छी तरह से हाथ से मिला लें
अब सभी मसाले डालकर अच्छी तरह से मसल कर हाथ से मिला लें
अब पानी डाल कर अच्छी तरह से गुथ ले थोड़ा सा सख्त जिससे नाचोज अच्छी तरह से बने
अब आप छोटी लोई बना कर पुरी बेल कर पिज्जा कटर से तिकोना काट लें
अब आप कढ़ाई गर्म कर तेल डाल कर सभी कटे हुए तिकोना को सुनहरे रंग या कुरकुरे होने तक सेक ले
लीजिए तैयार है आप सभी के लिए मुंग दाल नाचोज ठंडा होने पर एयरटाइट डिब्बे में डाल कर अच्छी तरह से बंद कर दें जब भी मन हो खाने का बस गरमागरम चाय के खाते और खिलाये अपनी पसंद की कोई भी डिप के साथ
चलिए फिर मिलते हैं आप सभी से एक नयी व्यंजन के साथ तब तक के लिए नमस्कार🙏🏻🙏🏻 दोस्तों धन्यवाद

title: Tumis oncom teri
ingredients: 5 siung bwang merah, banyak karena bawang nya kecil2
instructions: Potong2 oncom berbentuk dadu, siapkan teri kemudian cuci bersih
Siapkan bumbu, lalu ulek hingga halus
Tumis bumbu yang sudah dihaluskan tadi
Jika bumbu sudah harum masukan teri, aduk2... kemudian masukan oncom aduk2 dan beri stengah gelas air
Masukan bumbu pelengkap, tunggu hingga air menyusut dan tes rasa, tumis oncom teri siap dihidangkan😊

title: Roti Maryam/Roti Cane
instructions: Lelehkan margarin utk bahan cair... Biarkan smp agak dingin
